It's a waste of time.\""},{"lineNumber":10846,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………良いわけあるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...There's no way that's okay.\""},{"lineNumber":10847,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ガンジー様にできない事を、こいつが……？","translatedEnglishLine":"(Something this guy can do that Lord Gandhi can't...?"},{"lineNumber":10848,"originalJapaneseLine":"　…………いや、まさか）","translatedEnglishLine":"...No, it can't be.)"},{"lineNumber":10849,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前そんなにガンジーが好きなのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do you really like Gandhi that much?\""},{"lineNumber":10850,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あったりまえだろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course."},{"lineNumber":10851,"originalJapaneseLine":"　包容力があって、素晴らしい理想を掲げ、","translatedEnglishLine":"He has compassion, holds wonderful ideals,"},{"lineNumber":10852,"originalJapaneseLine":"　知勇をその為に惜しみなく注いでいる」","translatedEnglishLine":"and pours his knowledge and courage into them without hesitation.\""},{"lineNumber":10853,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それに比べたらあんたなんか、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Compared to that, you are,"},{"lineNumber":10854,"originalJapaneseLine":"　馬鹿でスケベで","translatedEnglishLine":"stupid and lecherous,"},{"lineNumber":10855,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただカオスに選ばれただけじゃないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"and just chosen by Chaos, aren't you?\""},{"lineNumber":10856,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前、ガンジーに憧れてるだけだろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're just admiring Gandhi."},{"lineNumber":10857,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただ擦り込まれてファザコンこじらせてるだけだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You've just been indoctrinated and developed a daddy complex.\""},{"lineNumber":10858,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいつがなんか優しくて無害だから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Isn't it just because he's kind and harmless,"},{"lineNumber":10859,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すり寄ってるだけじゃないのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"that you cling to him?\""},{"lineNumber":10860,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ッ、無礼な事を言うな！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"D-Don't say such disrespectful things!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あげてきなさいって。はいこれ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I said, bring it up. Here you go!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 満面の笑みで、バスケット一杯のパンを渡される。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a beaming smile, a basket full of bread was handed over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それじゃねー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "See you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明るく朗らかに、少女は去っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cheerfully and brightly, the girl left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （こ、子供にプレゼントされた……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I-I was given a present by a child...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人気はあるのか……く、何故……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Am I popular...? Wh-Why...?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 押しつけられた格好のバスケットを見て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking at the basket that was thrust upon him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは軽く首を傾げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance tilted his head slightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、ウィチタ。いるんだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, Wichita. You're there, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっち来い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come over here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっ……何故ばれる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... How did you find out...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 完璧に隠密してるはずなのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was supposed to be perfectly sneaky..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウィチタは渋々、木陰から姿を見せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reluctantly, Wichita showed herself from the shade of the tree.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほれ。半分やる。食おうぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Here. I'll give you half. Let's eat."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……どういう風の吹き回しだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What's gotten into you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんま好きじゃないのだ。ほれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't really like it much. Here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは勝手に適当な所に座り、隣を空けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance sat down somewhere at ease, leaving space beside him.
"...Hmph."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだか、それらしく断る理由も思いつかなくて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, unable to think of a proper reason to refuse,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウィチタは渋々、隣に座ってパンを食べ始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wichita reluctantly sat next to him and began eating the bread.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうだ。尾けてみて俺様の偉大さが分かったか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So? After following me, did you understand my greatness?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……分かるわけないでしょ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...There's no way I would get it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジー様と比べたら、宝石とハニーよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Compared to Lord Gandhi, you're like a jewel and honey."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よく分からんたとえを……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's a comparison I don't quite understand..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっきだってそうだ。風体は怪しかったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just like earlier. The appearance was suspicious,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に男が被害者だったのかもしれないでしょ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the man might really have been a victim.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああいうのは、一度調べるべきよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those things should be looked into at least once."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そしてガンジー様なら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And Lord Gandhi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たとえ悪人であっても殺しはしない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even if it’s a bad person, would never kill.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 拳で止めて、諭すだけに留める」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He would stop them with his fist and just admonish them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん。だから奴はアホなんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. That’s why he's an idiot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悠長にそんな事してる場合か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do we have time for such leisurely things?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ……なんだと、貴様！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wha... What did you say, you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウィチタは反射的に、腰の剣に手をやった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wichita reflexively reached for the sword at her waist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前はどうなんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What about you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーの悪口言っただけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just because you badmouthed Gandhi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かさんを斬り殺すのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are you going to cut someone down?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ……！　く、口の減らない奴……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh...! You, so damn mouthy...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ガンジーみたいに趣味優先でやってたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you act like Gandhi prioritizing his hobbies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の子に迷惑かけるクズが増えるだけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you'll just end up with more scumbags bothering girls."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっきのあいつなんか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That guy from earlier,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真偽がどうとか以前にクズだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: whether or not he was truthful, he's a scumbag.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺してしまっていいんだ。時間が無駄だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's fine to kill him. It's a waste of time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………良いわけあるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...There's no way that's okay."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ガンジー様にできない事を、こいつが……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Something this guy can do that Lord Gandhi can't...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: …………いや、まさか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...No, it can't be.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前そんなにガンジーが好きなのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you really like Gandhi that much?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あったりまえだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 包容力があって、素晴らしい理想を掲げ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has compassion, holds wonderful ideals,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知勇をその為に惜しみなく注いでいる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and pours his knowledge and courage into them without hesitation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに比べたらあんたなんか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Compared to that, you are,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 馬鹿でスケベで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stupid and lecherous,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただカオスに選ばれただけじゃないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and just chosen by Chaos, aren't you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、ガンジーに憧れてるだけだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're just admiring Gandhi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ擦り込まれてファザコンこじらせてるだけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've just been indoctrinated and developed a daddy complex."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいつがなんか優しくて無害だから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn't it just because he's kind and harmless,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すり寄ってるだけじゃないのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that you cling to him?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、無礼な事を言うな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D-Don't say such disrespectful things!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あげてきなさいって。はいこれ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I said, bring it up. Here you go!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 満面の笑みで、バスケット一杯のパンを渡される。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a beaming smile, a basket full of bread was handed over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それじゃねー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "See you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明るく朗らかに、少女は去っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cheerfully and brightly, the girl left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （こ、子供にプレゼントされた……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I-I was given a present by a child...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人気はあるのか……く、何故……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Am I popular...? Wh-Why...?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 押しつけられた格好のバスケットを見て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking at the basket that was thrust upon him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは軽く首を傾げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance tilted his head slightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、ウィチタ。いるんだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, Wichita. You're there, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっち来い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come over here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっ……何故ばれる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... How did you find out...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 完璧に隠密してるはずなのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was supposed to be perfectly sneaky..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウィチタは渋々、木陰から姿を見せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reluctantly, Wichita showed herself from the shade of the tree.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほれ。半分やる。食おうぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Here. I'll give you half. Let's eat."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……どういう風の吹き回しだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What's gotten into you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんま好きじゃないのだ。ほれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't really like it much. Here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは勝手に適当な所に座り、隣を空けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance sat down somewhere at ease, leaving space beside him.
"...Hmph."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだか、それらしく断る理由も思いつかなくて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, unable to think of a proper reason to refuse,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウィチタは渋々、隣に座ってパンを食べ始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wichita reluctantly sat next to him and began eating the bread.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうだ。尾けてみて俺様の偉大さが分かったか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So? After following me, did you understand my greatness?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……分かるわけないでしょ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...There's no way I would get it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジー様と比べたら、宝石とハニーよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Compared to Lord Gandhi, you're like a jewel and honey."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よく分からんたとえを……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's a comparison I don't quite understand..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっきだってそうだ。風体は怪しかったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just like earlier. The appearance was suspicious,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に男が被害者だったのかもしれないでしょ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the man might really have been a victim.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああいうのは、一度調べるべきよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those things should be looked into at least once."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そしてガンジー様なら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And Lord Gandhi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たとえ悪人であっても殺しはしない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even if it’s a bad person, would never kill.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 拳で止めて、諭すだけに留める」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He would stop them with his fist and just admonish them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん。だから奴はアホなんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. That’s why he's an idiot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悠長にそんな事してる場合か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do we have time for such leisurely things?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ……なんだと、貴様！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wha... What did you say, you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウィチタは反射的に、腰の剣に手をやった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wichita reflexively reached for the sword at her waist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前はどうなんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What about you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーの悪口言っただけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just because you badmouthed Gandhi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かさんを斬り殺すのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are you going to cut someone down?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ……！　く、口の減らない奴……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh...! You, so damn mouthy...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ガンジーみたいに趣味優先でやってたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you act like Gandhi prioritizing his hobbies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の子に迷惑かけるクズが増えるだけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you'll just end up with more scumbags bothering girls."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっきのあいつなんか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That guy from earlier,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真偽がどうとか以前にクズだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: whether or not he was truthful, he's a scumbag.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺してしまっていいんだ。時間が無駄だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's fine to kill him. It's a waste of time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………良いわけあるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...There's no way that's okay."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ガンジー様にできない事を、こいつが……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Something this guy can do that Lord Gandhi can't...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: …………いや、まさか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...No, it can't be.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前そんなにガンジーが好きなのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you really like Gandhi that much?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あったりまえだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 包容力があって、素晴らしい理想を掲げ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has compassion, holds wonderful ideals,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知勇をその為に惜しみなく注いでいる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and pours his knowledge and courage into them without hesitation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに比べたらあんたなんか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Compared to that, you are,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 馬鹿でスケベで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stupid and lecherous,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただカオスに選ばれただけじゃないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and just chosen by Chaos, aren't you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、ガンジーに憧れてるだけだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're just admiring Gandhi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ擦り込まれてファザコンこじらせてるだけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've just been indoctrinated and developed a daddy complex."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいつがなんか優しくて無害だから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn't it just because he's kind and harmless,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すり寄ってるだけじゃないのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that you cling to him?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、無礼な事を言うな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D-Don't say such disrespectful things!"
